flawed_nl_solution:
Michael has used 1100 rubber bands because 22 x 50 = <<22*50=1100>>1100
Michael has 9300 rubber bands remaining because 5000 - 1100 = 9300
Michael can make 31 large balls because 9300 / 300 = <<9300/300=31>>31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3900, not 9300. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
